• 01.

    WORK

    Design and writing projects

  • 02.

    NOTES

    Collections of thoughts and essays

  • 03.

    Bibliography

    The media currently influencing me

Love is Love

At Penzeys Spices I worked on a stand-alone web feature profiling same-sex couples in Wisconsin to build support for the ACLU challenging the same-sex ban in the state. This was my last project at Penzeys and the first design project I handled all the way through on my own.

Olsen + Peterson Wedding

When my writing partner asked if I could build him a website for his Glacier Mountain destination wedding, I knew it was an opportunity to push my skills even further. We layed out a twenty question choose-your-own adventure questionaire in PHP and AJAX.

Kingdom of Ends

A non-traditional narrative retelling of the life of the abolitionsit John Brown, this is my first serious film writing project since leaving college and has been over five years in making. Screenplay finally finished, we are in talks with producers and hope to start shooting in 2016.

PenzeyMoog + Erdmann Wedding

The first website I ever build on my own was for my Summer 2014 wedding. Mostly this was just me playing around in jQuery with a little PHP form to handle RSVP. I also did some print design for the invitations and thank you cards.

Other creative work

Mostly school work, this includes my dalliances with digital art, painting and journalism.
